text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Whew. I'm thirsty.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Gah, there's only one Fruits au Lait left, huh? That was a close one.

text_block_list.name: Gentle Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Oh… only one Fruits au Lait left.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What's your deal, buster? 
You thinkin' of buying this Fruits au Lait, huh?!

text_block_list.name: Gentle Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Um—?! N-No, I was just… thinking that I might not buy it… or maybe I will after all…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: W-Which one is it?! Just spit it out already, hurry up!

text_block_list.name: Gentle Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Eeeek! I'm sorryyyyy!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Wai— ugh, what was that…? Guess she didn't want it after all.

text_block_list.name: School Staff
text_block_list.text: …Put simply, Espo's behavior has gotten rather out of hand.

text_block_list.name: School Staff
text_block_list.text: I understand that the day-to-day aspect of things is not exactly your expertise, but if she doesn't show improvement soon, then…
choice_data_list: I-I'll try and get her under control!

text_block_list.text: What am I to do? When I recall Espoir City's usual remarks and habits, there are far too many instances that could be "out of hand".
But I know that at heart, she's really a good kid. If I could just show that to the school staff, they might change their minds about her…
I wander the school halls, turning the problem over in my mind. Suddenly, a poster stuck on the bulletin board catches my eye.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Whaaaat?! You want me to show the new kids around the school?!
That's right. The poster I spotted was looking for upperclassmen to teach new students about life at Tracen.
If she's dealing with underclassmen, maybe her softer side will come out. Plus, it would be perfect for improving her reputation, or so I thought…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: What're you, stupid?! Do I look like some errand girl for the school? Or an errand girl for the new kids, huh?!
It looks like the direct approach isn't working. Which means…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Huh? Show 'em what?
choice_data_list: Like, show 'em who runs this school…
Like, show 'em who runs this school…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Do you think I'm some kinda idiot who'll fall for that or somethin'?

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Hah. I can see right through what you're tryin' to do.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Well… I'm pretty much free, so… guess I might as well put a little fear into those scrawny rookies, yeah?
Still, I can't say I'm not nervous. Which means…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Why the hell do I gotta rehearse this?! Well, whatever. Hurry up 'n tell me your name. Spit it out.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: That's the lamest freakin' name I've ever heard… how the hell'd the likes of you end up at our school, huh?!
choice_data_list: Um, you should be a little more—

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Whassat?! You got a problem?! This is just the way I talk, so deal with it, punk!
choice_data_list: The real you is much kinder.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Wha?! Actin' like you know so much about me! You don't know jack about me, got it?!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Listen up, I do things how I wanna do them! Ain't you supposed to be a new student?! Just shut up and follow me!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Alright, this is an absolute must. Y'better remember this one. If you hang around in spots like this, nobody'll look down on you.
choice_data_list: Can't you keep it a bit more wholesome…?

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: This here's the stage we use for concert practices n' stuff. Oh, yeah. See that heart graffitied on the bench over there? Yeah, that was all me!
Despite her foul mouth, Espoir City gives me a surprisingly complete and sincere tour of the academy grounds.
choice_data_list: (Well, her heart's in the right place.)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Hey, you little punks. The hell you think you're eyeballing your upperclassman for, huh?!

text_block_list.name: New Students
text_block_list.text: W-Whaaaa?!? We weren't staring!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Hmph. Alright, listen up! If you wanna survive in this school… y'better not be making fun of me or nothing, got it?!
choice_data_list: (How did things end up like this?!)

text_block_list.text: No, no, it's fine… she's a good kid at heart… I just have to look at the long term, and it'll be fine.
